title: Ainslie Says Hopelessness Leads to Violence
itunes:title: Ainslie Says Hopelessness Leads to Violence
description:
Former Lehman Brothers Chairman Michael Ainslie discusses the civil unrest following the death of George Floyd. He explains the need to invest in education and jobs as a way of pulling people out of poverty and as a means of giving people hope.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
